lyrics:
24 contributorsthe last night lyricsinstrumental break

verse 1
you come to me with scars on your wrist
you tell me this will be the last night feeling like this
i just came to say goodbye
i didnt want you to see me cry im fine
but i know its a lie

chorus
this is the last night youll spend alone
look me in the eyes so i know you know
im everywhere you want me to be
the last night youll spend alone
ill wrap you in my arms and i wont let go
im everything you need me to be

verse 2
your parents say everything is your fault
but they dont know you like i know you they dont know you at all
im so sick of when they say
its just a phase youll be ok youre fine
but i know its a lie

chorus
this is the last night youll spend alone
look me in the eyes so i know you know
im everywhere you want me to be
the last night youll spend alone
ill wrap you in my arms and i wont let go
im everything you need me to be
the last night away from me
see skillet liveget tickets as low as 60you might also likeinstrumental break

bridge
the night is so long when everythings wrong
if you give me your hand i will help you hold on
tonight
tonight

chorus
this is the last night youll spend alone
look me in the eyes so i know you know
im everywhere you want me to be
the last night youll spend alone
ill wrap you in my arms and i wont let go
im everything you need me to be

postchorus
i wont let you say goodbye
ill be your reason why

outro
the last night away from me
away from me

instrumental break13embed
